mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (user_id, category_id, title, summary, content, cover_image, view_count, like_count, comment_count, is_top, is_recommend, status, publish_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{coverImage}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{isTop}, #{isRecommend}, #{status}, #{publishTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.name as category_name, u.nickname as author_name, u.avatar as author_avatar FROM article a LEFT JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE article SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.name as category_name, u.nickname as author_name, u.avatar as author_avatar FROM article a LEFT JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.is_recommend = 1 AND a.status = 2 ORDER BY a.publish_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
